summary: Successfully transferred the JSX table from EnrichmentScreen to ActionScreen component. Added a new 'Data Table' tab in the ActionScreen with the same table functionality, including column selection and data display. The table shows all companies (not just the first 3) and includes the same interactive column selection feature.
current_status: The ActionScreen now has a new 'Data Table' tab that contains the complete table functionality from EnrichmentScreen. Users can select which columns to display and view all company data in a comprehensive table format within the Action screen.
